subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|宀|呂|ls=ic}}: many rooms under a roof (a palace).

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: In reference to temples, 宮 ("palace") is used for {{w|Chinese folk religion|traditional deities}} considered to rank highly in the celestial bureaucracy, such as {{w|Mazu}} who was honored by the {{w|Qing dynasty}} as the "Queen of Heaven" after their successful {{w|Qing conquest of Taiwan|invasion of Taiwan}}.
